formelapplet-nojava:
Error message if Java not installed with link where to get from.

Parameters:
* $1 - "Java" (with link which points to http://java.com); hard-coded
formelapplet-missing-parameter:
Error message if parameter width or height or term/solution missing.

{{doc-important|Do not translate the parameters "width", "height" or "term/solution".}}
formelapplet-error:
General part of error message. Parameters:
* $1 - error message
